page.title: 12Entertainment
page.content: In our area there are two snooker halls,one situated in the Miners Welfare hall,one youth club and two swimming pools,one of which is outdoor.All the local cinema's,three in all,have closed and their buildings are now used for other purposes such as bingo.There was also a Roller Skating Disco in one of the old cinemas but this has recently closed. For adults there are numerous pubs and clubs. Most public concerts or plays in the area are held in the Miners Welfare Hall where the local Arts and Drama club frequently perform.Maesydderwyn school is also used at times. People here rely heavily on television,videos and computers as a source of entertainment.
